title: The Chrysalids
creator: Wyndham, John, 1903-1969
description: Genetic mutation has devastated the world and a bleak, primitive society has emerged from its ruins ; a society which punishes any deviation from rigid norms. Ten-year-old David is having strange dreams about a mysterious city. But in his ultra-religious village of Waknut, all abnormality is abhorred, and he soon realizes that differences can be very dangerous indeed
"Copyright 1955 by the estate of John Wyndham; Introduction copyright 2008 by Christopher Priest"--Title page verso
